keyword: how many calories in avocado toast
title: How Many Calories in Avocado Toast?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in avocado toast, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fats, carbs, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in Avocado Toast?
assumptions: 1 slice whole wheat bread (28g), 1/2 medium avocado (68g mashed), lightly salted; no added oil, toppings, or spreads.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, avocado size, ripeness, and additions like oil or seasonings. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One serving of basic avocado toast has ~245 kcal, with healthy fats from avocado and fiber from bread.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged products.

tweaks.label: Use sourdough bread instead of whole wheat

faqs.q: How many calories in avocado toast with egg?
faqs.a: About 315 kcal for basic version plus one fried egg.

faqs.q: Is avocado toast high in healthy fats?
faqs.a: Yes, ~15 g total fat per serving, mostly monounsaturated from avocado.

faqs.q: How much protein in avocado toast?
faqs.a: Around 6 g per basic serving; add egg or seeds to boost.

faqs.q: Does avocado toast have a lot of carbs?
faqs.a: Moderate at 24 g per serving, with 7 g fiber for better digestion.

faqs.q: Can I make low-calorie avocado toast?
faqs.a: Use thinner bread or less avocado to drop to ~180 kcal; skip oil.
